Oge-Pedic mba ụwa, Inc., nke bụzi akụkụ nke Tempur Sealy mba ụwa, bụ onye na-emepụta ma na-ekesa matarasị na ohiri isi e ji ụfụfụ mee
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwere isi ụlọ ọrụ na Coldstream Nnyocha kamposna Lexington, Kentucky ma nwee ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe nọr na mkpóró ndị ihe na Duffield, Virginia na Albuquerque, New Mexico.
Tempur dabeere na nyocha NASA iji mepụta ihe ga-eme ka oche ụgbọ elu dị mma ma melite ịdị ndụ ma ọ bụrụ na ihe mberede.
Ọ bụ Fagerdala World Foams, ụlọ ọrụ Swedish technical foam, webatara matarasị Tempur-Pedic mbụ

E webatara akara ahụ na United States na 1992 ma guzobe ụlọ ọrụ Tempur-Pedic, Inc. Ndị nkesa itoolu nke Fagerdala, gụnyere Tempur-Pedic, Inc., jikọtara na 1999 iji guzobe ụlọ ọrụ Tempur World, nke gbanwere na 2002 dị ka Tempur-Bedic mba ụwa Inc
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ pụtara n'ihu ọha n'afọ 2003. N'afọ 2012, Tempur-Pedic na Sealy Corporation kwupụtara atụmatụ ijikọ. Tempur-Pedic kwụrụ $ 228.6 nde, mana ụlọ ọrụ abụọ ahụ na-arụ ọrụ iche.
N'afọ 2015, ụlọ ọrụ German Federal Cartel Office kwụrụ ụlọ ọrụ Tempur-Pedic nke Germany ụgwọ nde € 15.5 maka itinye aka na nhazi ọnụahịa kwụ ọtọ n'etiti Ọgọstụ 2005 na Julaị 2011.
